messages.content: ComfyUI-MX-post-processing-nodes is a collection of post-processing nodes for ComfyUI that adds image post-processing adjustment capabilities.
What does the MX_Blend node do in ComfyUI-MX-post-processing-nodes?
The MX_Blend node blends two images using arithmetic operations like add, multiply, overlay, darken, lighten, etc.
How does the MX_ColorCorrect node adjust an image?
The MX_ColorCorrect node adjusts the color balance, temperature, hue, brightness, contrast, saturation, and gamma of an image.
What effect does the MX_SineWave node create?
The MX_SineWave node runs a sine wave through the image, making it appear squiggly.
Which node in ComfyUI-MX-post-processing-nodes applies a vignette effect?
The MX_Vignette node applies a vignette effect, putting the corners of the image in shadow.

To install ComfyUI-MX-post-processing-nodes, navigate to your '/ComfyUI/custom_nodes/' folder, run 'git clone https://github.com/Intersection98/ComfyUI_MX_post_processing-nodes', and then run 'pip install -r requirements.txt'.
What is the purpose of the MX_LUT node?
The MX_LUT node adds a Look-Up Table (LUT) to the image for color grading.
